articles.description: Shares of Bilibili opened 2.2% below their issue price before slipping further in early trade
articles.content:
image copyrightGetty Images
Shares of Chinese video platform Bilibili have slumped at their launch on the Hong Kong stock exchange.
The shares opened at HKD$790 ($101.6 ; £73.7), which is 2.2% belo… [+2197 chars]

articles.author: Reuters Staff
articles.title: China generated over half world's coal-fired power in 2020: study - Reuters
articles.description: China generated 53% of the world's total coal-fired power in 2020, nine percentage points more that five years earlier, despite climate pledges and the building of hundreds of renewable energy plants, a global data study showed on Monday.
articles.content:
By Reuters Staff
SHANGHAI (Reuters) - China generated 53% of the worlds total coal-fired power in 2020, nine percentage points more that five years earlier, despite climate pledges and the building … [+1866 chars]
